display_long_description:
# FULL RELEASE DOWNLOAD NOW!
# OVER 100,000 PLAYERS!

Enter the world Of **Multiplayer Minigames In VR!** compete with up to **14 other players & friends across** dozens of the best minigames!

Definitely not based on any online streaming pop culture korean tv shows, as that would get us in legal trouble, so we're certainly not doing that.

# Our Awesome Minigames - 

- **Stepping Glass**: Carefully step on the correct glass tiles without falling through in this nerve-wracking challenge.
[media]

- **Last Runner**: Who will be the first to reach the end?
[media]

- **Snowball Fight**: Join the snowball fight, but don't build a snowman!
[media]

- **Sky Fall**: Navigate through the skies and avoid obstacles in this aerial challenge.
[media]

- **Green Mountain Obstacle Course**: Race against others in a thrilling obstacle course!
[media]

- **Falling Stones**: The stones will floor under you, try not to fall.

- **The Wall**: Are you ready to climb? Be the first to reach the top!

- **Bomb Tag**: Pass the bomb to other players to avoid getting blown up in this fast-paced game of tag.

- **Green Light, Red Light**: Test your reflexes and strategy in this classic stop-and-go game.

# Will you win the show?
[media]

**Minimum 2 players are required to start a match, please give us any feedback on discord & our site at www.theshowvr.com**

Our goal is to make the funniest community multiplayer minigames game on VR :)
